title: ‘Thor: Love and Thunder’ and Five Ways to Fix the Marvel Crisis
description:
There’s some angst among fans of the biggest franchise story of the 21st century. So Sean is joined by Charles Holmes and Rob Mahoney to discuss 'Thor: Love and Thunder', and the MCU'S recent struggles. They then pitch the Marvel stories they want to see on the big screen.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guests: Charles Holmes and Rob Mahoney
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
